game.name: Nights of Nil
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Control your villagers one by one in this action-RTS survival game. Build, defend, and survive night after night across procedural islands. Assign tasks, fight off waves, and settle each island to win the run.
